description:
Warm gloves for little rippers that will keep hands cozy from the first chair to the last. Gordini’s Tiptop Junior gloves are a full-featured glove for the smaller set. Lined with a soft fleece and insulated with Primaloft®, tiny hands stay warm during long days in the cold. A rugged, nylon shell with a waterproof breathable membrane add another layer of protection against the elements.

  • Insulated with lightweight, wind-resistant Primaloft insulation
  • Waterproof breathable Aquabloc® membrane keeps hands dry
  • Lined with soft and warm Lavawool® that blends the wicking properties of fleece with the warmth of wool
  • Wrist-cinch strap and cuff toggle help keep the gloves on
  • Long gauntlet ensures heat wont escape between the gloves and jacket
  • Clip keeps gloves together when not in use
name: Gordini Tiptop Junior Gloves - Children to Youths
